verses.text: Unto thee will I cry, O \sc Lord\sc* my rock; be not silent to me: Lest, \add if\add* thou be silent to me, I become like them that go down into the pit.
Hear the voice of my supplications, when I cry unto thee, When I lift up my hands toward thy holy oracle.
Draw me not away with the wicked, and with the workers of iniquity, Which speak peace to their neighbours, but mischief \add is\add* in their hearts.
Give them according to their deeds, And according to the wickedness of their endeavours: Give them after the work of their hands; Render to them their desert.
Because they regard not the works of the \sc Lord\sc*, Nor the operation of his hands, He shall destroy them, and not build them up.
Blessed \add be\add* the \sc Lord\sc*, because he hath heard the voice of my supplications.
The \sc Lord\sc* \add is\add* my strength and my shield; My heart trusted in him, and I am helped: Therefore my heart greatly rejoiceth; And with my song will I praise him.
The \sc Lord\sc* \add is\add* their strength, And he \add is\add* the saving strength of his anointed.
Save thy people, And bless thine inheritance: Feed them also, and lift them up for ever.
